title: Google\Cloud\Optimization\V1\OptimizeToursResponse\Metrics
name: Metrics
description:
Overall metrics, aggregated over all routes.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.optimization.v1.OptimizeToursResponse.Metrics

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.aggregated_route_metrics
params.description: Aggregated over the routes. Each metric is the sum (or max, for loads) over all [ShipmentRoute.metrics][google.cloud.optimization.v1.ShipmentRoute.metrics] fields of the same name.

params.name: data.used_vehicle_count
params.description: Number of vehicles used. Note: if a vehicle route is empty and [Vehicle.used_if_route_is_empty][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Vehicle.used_if_route_is_empty] is true, the vehicle is considered used.

params.name: data.earliest_vehicle_start_time
params.description: The earliest start time for a used vehicle, computed as the minimum over all used vehicles of [ShipmentRoute.vehicle_start_time][google.cloud.optimization.v1.ShipmentRoute.vehicle_start_time].

params.name: data.latest_vehicle_end_time
params.description: The latest end time for a used vehicle, computed as the maximum over all used vehicles of [ShipmentRoute.vehicle_end_time][google.cloud.optimization.v1.ShipmentRoute.vehicle_end_time].

params.name: data.costs
params.description: Cost of the solution, broken down by cost-related request fields. The keys are proto paths, relative to the input OptimizeToursRequest, e.g. "model.shipments.pickups.cost", and the values are the total cost generated by the corresponding cost field, aggregated over the whole solution. In other words, costs["model.shipments.pickups.cost"] is the sum of all pickup costs over the solution. All costs defined in the model are reported in detail here with the exception of costs related to TransitionAttributes that are only reported in an aggregated way as of 2022/01.

params.name: data.total_cost
params.description: Total cost of the solution. The sum of all values in the costs map.

methods.name: getCosts
methods.description:
Cost of the solution, broken down by cost-related request fields.

The keys are proto paths, relative to the input OptimizeToursRequest, e.g. "model.shipments.pickups.cost", and the values are the total cost generated by the corresponding cost field, aggregated over the whole solution. In other words, costs["model.shipments.pickups.cost"] is the sum of all pickup costs over the solution. All costs defined in the model are reported in detail here with the exception of costs related to TransitionAttributes that are only reported in an aggregated way as of 2022/01.
